It is based on the notion of typed links connecting words .The result of parsing is one or more ordered parses , termed linkages .A linkage consists of a set of links connecting the words of a sentence so that links do not cross , no two links connect the same two words , and the types of the links satisfy the linking requirements given to each word in the lexicon .
